author: Simon Clark
title: Africa Risks Bubble in Private-Equity Market, Reports Says
text:
A bubble may be forming in sub-Saharan Africaâ€™s emerging private-equity market because too many funds are targeting a small number of companies capable of absorbing international investment, according to a new report.
Private-equity firms in sub-Saharan Africa have an excess of $4 billion which they are seeking to invest, according to the...
